title: Robe
description: Coat of embroidered staw-colored satin.  Design of floral sprays and large canopied lantern with long life character.  Double sleeve bands of embroidered yellow and embroidered white satin.  Collar band and border on bottom and sides of black satin embroidered with flowers.  Colors pink, mauve, blue, green, red and orange.  Chiefly satin and outline stitch.Wide sleeves. Lining of yellow satin.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
